# CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.default

**Case**

Displays the suggestion normally.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Suggestion types

- **CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.none**: Blocks the system from displaying the suggestion.
- **CSSuggestion.SuggestionKind.custom**: Sorts the custom suggestions together.

items.description: Blocks the system from displaying the suggestion.
